Uses of Class
moulton.scalable.clickables.RadioButton

Packages that use RadioButton
Package Description
moulton.scalable.clickables
The clickables package contains classes that pertain to menu components that can be clicked.
moulton.scalable.draggables
The draggables package contains clickable subclasses that are intended to be dragged or scrolled.
moulton.scalable.geometrics
The geometrics package contains classes pertaining to primarily to aesthetics, such as lines and polygons.
moulton.scalable.visuals
The visuals package contains classes that relate to images and animations.

  • Uses of RadioButton in moulton.scalable.clickables

    Subclasses of RadioButton in moulton.scalable.clickables
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Button
    A menu component that is a simple rectangular button with optional frontal text saved as Button.text.
    class  FormButton
    The Form Button is a button specially adapted to work with forms.
    Fields in moulton.scalable.clickables declared as RadioButton
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected RadioButton RadioGroup.selected
    The radio button that is selected.

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.LinkedList<RadioButton> RadioGroup.group
    The radio buttons in this group.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.clickables that return RadioButton
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    RadioButton RadioGroup.getSelected()
    The radio button in this group that is currently selected.
    Methods in moulton.scalable.clickables with parameters of type RadioButton
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void RadioGroup.addButton​(RadioButton rb)
    Adds the button provided to the group if not already added.
    boolean RadioGroup.removeButton​(RadioButton rb)
    Removes the specified button from the group.
    void RadioGroup.select​(RadioButton selected)
    Selects this radio button and deselects all others in this group
    Constructors in moulton.scalable.clickables with parameters of type RadioButton
    Constructor Description
    RadioGroup​(RadioButton... buttons)
    Creates a new radio group and adds the buttons specified to the group.
